item.title: the whole point of automation
item.author: Unknown
item.description: Automation will help us get things done quickly and efficiently, but I have to say - I have never read anything more creative when it comes to scripting. This is a true story that was told by Nihad Abbasov [Narkoz] based on his experience with one of his co-worker's scripts.

item.title: tmux - walkthrough with a practical example
item.author: Unknown
item.description: This brief post contains some notes related to tmux - from installation to practical example.

item.title: Filesystem Hierarchy Standard - study notes
item.author: Unknown
item.description: This standard consists of a set of requirements and guidelines for file and directory placement under UNIX-like operating systems. The guidelines are intended to support interoperability of applications, system administration tools, development tools, and scripts as well as greater uniformity of documentation for these systems.

item.title: about
item.author: Unknown
item.description: The main purpose of this about page is to actually provide more information about me and this blog. I am not a writer, but I will give my best to provide description for this endeavour and actually the main motivation behind it. Just to debug my thoughts or for something more?
